alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued May 21 at 3:19PM CDT until May 22 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 31 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Southern Lake, Southern Cook and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band and the Grand Portage Reservation. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 AM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Downtown areas of Grand Marais, Silver Bay, Two Harbors, and Duluth will likely stay frost-free. Locations in the higher terrain above the lakeshore and areas farther inland will have a greater risk of frost than those by the lakeshore.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
